stats.expectedRevenue: Expected revenue from upcoming and ongoing rentals

tooltips.todayRevenue: Total actual revenue from orders created today. Includes both rental and sales orders.
tooltips.todayRentals: Number of new rental orders created today. Only counts orders with RESERVED, PICKUPED, or RETURNED status.
tooltips.activeRentals: Total number of currently active rental orders. Includes all orders with PICKUPED status (currently being rented) and not yet returned.
tooltips.overdueReturns: Number of rental orders that are overdue for return. Orders where the planned return date has passed but items haven't been returned yet.
tooltips.totalRevenue: Total revenue from all orders in the system. Includes both rental and sales orders from the beginning until now.
tooltips.totalOrders: Total number of orders created in the system. Includes all types of orders: rental, sales, and rent-to-own.
tooltips.totalCustomers: Total number of customers registered in the system. Includes both individual and business customers.
tooltips.totalProducts: Total number of products in inventory. Includes all products that have been added to the system.
tooltips.availableProducts: Number of products currently available for rental. Excludes products that are currently being rented or have been sold.
tooltips.pendingOrders: Number of orders waiting to be processed. Orders with RESERVED status that haven't been picked up yet.
tooltips.completedOrders: Number of completed orders. Rental orders that have been returned or sales orders that have been delivered.
tooltips.futureRevenue: Expected revenue from upcoming orders. Includes ongoing rentals and pre-booked orders.
tooltips.thisWeekRevenue: Total revenue for this week. Calculated from Monday to Sunday of the current week.
tooltips.thisMonthRevenue: Total revenue for this month. Calculated from the 1st to the end of the current month.
tooltips.thisYearRevenue: Total revenue for this year. Calculated from January 1st to the present.
tooltips.customerGrowth: Growth rate of new customers. Compared to the previous period.
tooltips.revenueGrowth: Revenue growth rate. Compared to the previous period to assess business performance.
tooltips.productUtilization: Product utilization rate. Percentage of products currently being rented compared to total available products.

charts.noData: No data available for this period

stats.expectedRevenue: Expected revenue from upcoming and ongoing rentals
